data.title: Llandudno school prepares for Addams Family play at Venue Cymru!
data.meta_description: The students will be performing an Addams Family production at Venue Cymru from March 23-24.
data.text:
Ysgol John Bright students took a trip to the Abergele castle before their upcoming Addams Family production debuts at Venue Cymru on March 23.

The students, who range in age from 11 to 18, spent the afternoon at the location using their creative talents to capture images and footage that perfectly capture the dark, macabre mood of the beloved musical.

Their photos and video showcase the haunting beauty of the castle and will be used to promote the school's Addams Family production, which also takes place on March 24.

MORE: REVIEW: King and I at Venue Cymru - 'Something Wonderful'

"The opportunity to take promotional photos and videos at Gwrych Castle was a dream come true for our students," said Ysgol John Bright drama teacher Ms Pender.

"The location was perfect for capturing the mood and atmosphere of 'Addams Family,' and our students rose to the challenge, creating stunning images that we know will excite and entice audiences."

The school's production of Addams Family features a talented cast and live band.

Tickets for the production are on sale now and can be purchased from the Venue Cymru box office or online.
